「自宅前で頭かじられた」クマに襲われ男性失明

02 Nov 2019, 08:43



クマによる人身被害が発生した住宅地を巡回するパトカー（１日、秋田市添川で）＝山路草太撮影

　秋田市添川の民家敷地内で１０月３１日午後８時頃、住人の派遣社員男性（４６）がクマに襲われ、両目を失明するなどの重傷を負った。現場はＪＲ秋田駅の北東約４キロの住宅地。住民らは「こんなことはなかったのに……」と経験したことのない恐怖に顔をこわばらせた。今年に入り、県内でのクマによる人身被害は１３件目で、秋田市内では初。人間の生活圏でのクマの出没が常態化していることへの危機感が高まる中、県や県警などは１日、緊急対策会議を開いた。県は３０日まで「ツキノワグマ出没警報」を発令している。



　「自宅前で頭をかじられた」――。被害に遭った男性は、頭や顔に大けがを負い、自力で家の中へ逃げ込んで１１９番。秋田市内の病院に救急搬送されたが、頭蓋骨骨折などの重傷で、両目を失明した。命に別条はないというが、入院し治療を受けている。秋田東署の発表によると、男性は帰宅して自転車を降りたところ、自宅敷地内の物置裏辺りからクマが突然現れ、男性に襲いかかった。家族によると、男性は、電話機を手探りし、消防に救助を求めたという。
　現場の住宅地周辺には山林が広がっている。県によると、周囲３キロでは今年４月以降、３４件（１０月３１日現在）のクマの目撃情報がある。ただ、住宅地で起きた人身被害の衝撃は大きく、一夜明けた１日、読売新聞の取材に答えた住民の６０歳代男性は「１８年ほど住んでいるが、クマに襲われるなんて聞いたことがない」と言葉を失った。
　県内では近年、住宅地や集落など、人間の生活圏を脅かすクマの存在がクローズアップされている。県自然保護課は「住宅地などの周辺の里山に複数の『里グマ』がすみついていると考えられる」と指摘。住宅地に植えられた栗の木から落ちた実や、ごみ集積所に持ち込まれた食べ残しなどが、クマをおびき寄せる原因になると警鐘を鳴らす。
　県警地域課のまとめによると、県内では４月以降、クマの目撃は６３４件（３１日現在）。中でも目立つのは１０月で、前年同月（１４件）の３倍近い３９件となっている。人身被害は４月以降、１３件（３１日現在）で、前年同期（７件）の倍近い。このうち９月以降は８件と、秋に入ってから増えている。同課は「人里の被害が増えており、警戒を強めている」としている。
　３１日の人身被害を受け、県や秋田市、県警などは１日、緊急対策会議を開き、近く現場周辺で、クマが潜みやすい草地や、クマをおびき寄せる原因となる実のなる樹木などの点検を行うことを申し合わせた。

"He was bitten in front of his home" attacked by a bear and blind man

02 Nov 2019, 08:43



A police car patrols a residential area where a human injury caused by a bear (one day at Soekawa, Akita City)

A male resident worker (46) was attacked by a bear and suffered serious injuries such as blindness in both eyes around 8 pm on October 31 at the private house site in Soekawa, Akita City. The site is a residential area about 4 km northeast of JR Akita Station. Residents were scared of fear that they had never experienced before. This year is the 13th case of human injury caused by bears in the prefecture, the first in Akita city. The prefectural police and the prefectural police held an emergency response meeting on the 1st amid a growing sense of crisis that bear haunts in the human life zone have become normal. The prefecture has issued a “Black Bear Infestation Warning” until the 30th.



“I was bitten by my head”. The man who suffered damage injured his head and face. Although he was transported to an emergency hospital in Akita, he lost his eyes due to a serious injury such as a skull fracture. Although there is no separate provision for life, he is hospitalized and treated. According to the Akita Higashi Station announcement, when the man got home and got off the bicycle, a bear suddenly appeared from behind the storeroom in his home and attacked the man. According to the family, the man sought out the phone and asked the fire department for help.
There are forests around the residential area. According to the prefecture, there are 34 (as of October 31) witness information on bears in the 3km area since April this year. However, the impact of personal injury in a residential area was great, and one day after dawn, a 60-year-old male who responded to the coverage of the Yomiuri Shimbun said, “I lived for about 18 years, but I heard that a bear will attack me. I have no words. "
In recent years, the presence of bears that threaten the human sphere of life, such as residential areas and settlements, has been highlighted in the prefecture. The Prefectural Nature Conservation Division pointed out that it is thought that there are several “Satokuma” living in the surrounding satoyama such as residential areas. If a fruit dropped from a chestnut tree planted in a residential area, or leftover food brought to a garbage dump, will cause a bear to snag.
According to the summary of the Prefectural Police Regional Division, there have been 634 bear sightings in the prefecture since April (as of 31st). Of these, the most noticeable is October, with 39 cases nearly three times the same month last year (14 cases). Personal injury has been 13 (as of 31st) since April, nearly double that of the same period last year (7). Of these, there have been 8 since September, an increase since the fall. The section says, “The damage to the villages is increasing and the vigilance is getting stronger.”
